Title: XamlingCore
Description: XamlingCore is a set of base classes to help devleopers quickly build MVVM applications in Silverlight, WPF and Windows Phone 7. It includes a navigation framework and utility classes.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
XamlingCore is a set of base classes to help devleopers quickly build MVVM applications in Silverlight, WPF and Windows Phone 7. It includes a navigation framework and utility classes.


See http://blog.webjak.net for more info!
